data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hemp, Claudia (2013): Annotated list of Ensifera (Orthoptera) and further records on Caelifera (Orthoptera) of Mt Kilimanjaro, Tanzania. Zootaxa 3613 (4): 301-342, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3613.4.1
